name: Junior/Middle DevOps Specialist
description:
Aramco Innovations is a Russian representative office of the research center that is the part of Saudi Aramco, the state-owned national oil company of Saudi Arabia.

Aramco Research Center in Moscow supports development in the areas of upstream technologies in simulation and modeling, advanced materials, data analytics and artificial intelligence. It promotes collaborative research activities with nearby Lomonosov Moscow State University and other entities in Russia.

We are looking for a skilled and motivated Junior/Middle DevOps Specialist to join team. The candidate should be responsible for supporting, developing, and maintaining company’s infrastructure with a focus on automation and process optimization.

Read the job description to the end and write why you are suitable for this position.

Key functions and responsibilities:

  • Support and development of the company's infrastructure, ensure its stable operation, as well as introduce new technologies and solutions;
  • Work closely with the development team, provide them with the necessary tools and resources to work effectively, test and deploy products, maintain, and develop pipelines.

Technical skills and competencies:

  • Experience with Linux-based OS, Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, Gitlab CI/CD, Ansible, Nginx, Zabbix, Prometheus, Grafana;
  • Proficiency in programming languages (Python);
  • Good communication skills in English are important. Please use English profile to apply for this role.

Will be an advantage:

  • Develop IaC for cloud and On-Premise infrastructure. For example, writing roles for deployment on different platforms, OS, etc.;
  • Experience with virtualization (KVM, libvirt);
  • Experience with MLOPS (AirFlow, MLFlow);

Conditions:

  • Registration according to the Labor Code of the Russian Federation;
  • Salary is discussed;
  • Several types of employment (in-house, contract, part-time).
  • Office: Danilovskaya manufactura;
  • Providing opportunities for professional and advanced training.
